Some big updates to the Stake app:

+ A drop in the minimum funding to A$50 (previously A$500). Get in the world's largest and most dynamic share market with as little as A$50.
+ Minimum trade amounts have also been lowered to US$10.
+ In-app experience and speeds improved throughout.
+ Deposit funds from your AUD Wallet into your US trading account from within the app.
+ View all your unsettled funds and when they will clear to trade.
+ Less bugs! Not that we’re saying there were any bugs before. But there are definitely fewer.

Want to update the email on your Stake account directly from the app? Just make sure you have the latest update.

And in this release, we’ve fixed bugs, performance improvements and increased the max funding amount for POLi to $150k. Just for you.

Some big updates in this build based on your feedback:
+ New chart functionality. Get precise price and date reference points by clicking on the charts.
+ Extended express funding to 10pm (AEST). Fund your account by card before 10pm and your funds will be in your account before the market opens.
+ Debit / Credit card fundings max amount is now A$10,000.
+ Improved data and performance throughout.

+ Improved data and performance throughout.

We’ve been busy building! After taking in your feedback, we’ve unrolled some key features:

+ We’ve improved charting: Now view candlestick charts and we’ve added axes too.
+ Pinpoint precision. Improved press charts to check and toggle prices
+ Portfolio page and holdings have been updated. Track more of your performing stocks in one single view.
+General performance improvements & bug fixes.

As always, let us know what you want to see next.
Trade up.

+General performance improvements & bug fixes.

As always, let us know what you want to see next.

Trade up.

There has been a continual improvement to the overall trading experience.
The changes are quite technical, but important.
Changes that you'll notice outside of market hours:
- 1day charts are anchored to previous close. You now have more context about daily moves and gap opens.
- 1day axis are now fixed to the previous close. This gives far more context about the actual movement of a stock, especially for illiquid stocks that only trade a couple of times a day.
During market hours
All of the above chart features, but live. So you know what the actual move is, 1day charts will render as if it is moving relative to the close from the previous period.
So you can sense of how the market is moving, we've introduced a single point hover which moves as the price moves, giving the app a feeling of being alive. Just like the market is!
There are some HUGE changes coming in the next month or so, so stay tuned!

Introducing... Our biggest update yet!

An enhanced Stake App experience with some optimised and some new features, including a number based on the great feedback and suggestions we get from customers.

Tabs
At the bottom of the screen, you will now see four tabs (Portfolio, Watchlist, Discover and Other), allowing you to navigate the app much more quickly and easily. Also, this offers the ability to toggle between and compare 3 stocks at once when you have a stock open in each tab.

Account Switch
For customers with multiple accounts, you now have the ability to seamlessly switch between them within the App.

Full-screen Portfolio View
You’re now able to see your entire portfolio and all metrics (units, average price, last price, day return, total return) when you click into in full screen. This offers the best picture of your portfolio's performance.

In-App Reporting
All the reporting functions previously available on Web-only are now available on the App too. This allows you to get all of your activity history in excel format.

Brand New Order Pad
A better order pad experience helping you:
Easily change order types from Market, Limit and Stop Orders
Access National best bid prices to gather a clearer picture of the market depth
Execute trades faster to capture the opportunity at hand

Easily change order types from Market, Limit and Stop Orders

Access National best bid/ask prices to gather a clearer picture of the market depth

Execute trades faster to capture the opportunity at hand

Introducing... Our biggest update yet!


An enhanced Stake App experience with some optimised and some new features, including a number based on the great feedback and suggestions we get from customers.


Tabs

At the bottom of the screen, you will now see four tabs (Portfolio, Watchlist, Discover and Other), allowing you to navigate the app much more quickly and easily. Also, this offers the ability to toggle between and compare 3 stocks at once when you have a stock open in each tab.


Account Switch

For customers with multiple accounts, you now have the ability to seamlessly switch between them within the App.


Full-screen Portfolio View

You’re now able to see your entire portfolio and all metrics (units, average price, last price, day return, total return) when you click into in full screen. This offers the best picture of your portfolio's performance.


In-App Reporting

All the reporting functions previously available on Web-only are now available on the App too. This allows you to get all of your activity history in excel format.

Our focus is on constantly innovating and enhancing the Stake experience. We update our App regularly with improvements and bug fixes. In this update:


Day Trading

+ Trade on your unsettled funds with Stake Black.


Hello, Dashboard

+ Get a clearer picture of your portfolio with the enhanced view.


New Markets Page

+ Go deep, discover more and get ideas in the ‘Wall St’ tab.


Activity and Reports

+ Significantly improved statements and reporting.


Dividends and Transactions

+ See dividends more easily with the updated transaction log.


Funds & Balances

+ Finer detail and clarity over your cash and balances.
